scripts.seed-products: mongoimport -h localhost:27017 --db dashboard --collection products --type json --jsonArray --file ./seed-data/products.json --mode merge
scripts.seed-orders: mongoimport -h localhost:27017 --db dashboard --collection orders --type json --jsonArray --file ./seed-data/orders.json --mode merge
scripts.seed-all: npm run seed-products && npm run seed-orders
